name: After Midnight
description:
This thing you see here is a short weird semi-intercative experience, rather than game. But I always wanted to make something about evening and fireplace, and here it is.

It's not that much about gameplay or story — you wake up in a small hut and examine it and its surroundings. The game has an end though.

I hope you enjoy its style and atmosphere.

Music:

"Night on the Docks"
"In Your Arms"
"Night on the Docks — Sax"
"Cool Vibes"
"Night on the Docks — Piano"
by Kevin MacLeod
